snippet: The city’s public education effort speaks frankly about the increased chances that teenage mothers will become impoverished, but critics say it reinforces stereotypes.
abstract: New York City public education campaign targeting teenage pregnancy speaks frankly about the increased chances that teenage mothers will become impoverished, but critics say it reinforces negative stereotypes about teenage mothers without offering any information to help girls prevent unplanned pregnancies.
lead_paragraph: The city’s public education effort speaks frankly about the increased chances that teenage mothers will become impoverished, but critics say it reinforces stereotypes.

headline.seo: City Campaign Targeting Teenage Pregnancy Draws Criticism
headline.main: Posters on Teenage Pregnancy Draw Fire
headline.print_headline: Posters on Teenage Pregnancy Draw Fire
